channel.description: Daily alerts on Telugu cinema, Telugu film news, Tollywood gossips on HT. Stay tuned for latest Tollywood movies updates, recent Telugu movies, south indian actor photos, videos and breaking news on HT.

image.title: Telugu Cinema News: Get Latest Tollywood Movies, Films, Celebrity Photos, Videos Online | Hindustan Times

item.title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu climbs 600 steps barefoot to seek blessing at Pazhani temple, lights camphor on her way
item.description: Samantha Ruth Prabhu recently visited the Pazhani temple, ahead of Shaakuntalam release. She sought blessings and clicked photos with some fans.

item.title: Rana Daggubati's wife Miheeka Bajaj teases him, pens note on Valentine’s Day: ‘To the man of my dreams’. See pic
item.description: On Valentine’s Day, Rana Daggubati's wife Miheeka Bajaj teased him as she penned a note. Check out her post here.

item.title: Janhvi Kapoor to make Telugu debut opposite Jr NTR in NTR 30, project to roll in March
item.description: Janhvi Kapoor is all set to make her Telugu debut alongside actor Jr NTR, as per sources. She is expected to join the film's team for a photoshoot soon.

item.title: Ram Charan makes grand entry amid cheering fans as he lands on RC 15 set from chopper in leaked video. Watch
item.description: In a leaked video from the shoot, a chopper is seen landing as cheering fans try to catch a glimpse of Ram Charan he steps down from the aircraft.

item.title: Mahesh Babu’s son reacts as he’s chased by paparazzi while attending India’s first Formula E race in Hyderabad
item.description: Mahesh Babu’s son Gautam Ghattamaneni was chased by media for his reaction as he attended India’s first Formula E race in Hyderabad on Saturday.
